description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions (incorporating a juliet balcony) and installation of 3no. rooflights to front roofslope
decision_conditions: The proposed hip to gable roof extension, rear dormer extension and installation of 4no.x front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B & Class C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The submitted elevations are not labelled as existing or proposed. Please provide all Existing and Proposed Elevations at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work.

You are advised that the Council does have formal powers to control noise and nuisance under The Control of Pollution Act 1974, the Clean Air Acts and other relevant legislation, and that any works undertaken which impact unreasonably upon the surrounding area may be subject to action by the Council's Environmental Health Department.
